attributes.action: Make it illegal for Coarse fish to be killed in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Please make it illegal to kill all species of coarse fish in the United Kingdom.

In recent times EU migrants have been killing coarse fish on an industrial scale and this is endangering native species and ruining opportunities for leisure anglers in the UK.

Coarse fishing is a very popular sporting pastime and brings business to rural areas as well as business opportunities for angling retailers.

Please protect Coarse fish stocks in the UK.
